attributes.action: not award Bob Paisley a knighthood, on the grounds that he is dead. If we award him a knighthood are we then going to go back through history looking for people who did great things and were not honoured.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Or more importantly are RS fans going to spend there important fjord sailing, cornish pasty making, sheep shearing time finding the historic figures that should of had knighthoods?

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
